generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and tram tracks, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and featuring a bicycle rack and a clock.
- building: Buildings with multiple windows and architectural details are visible on the left side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and utility poles.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, showing red signals.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with an upward arrow is visible on a pole.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are visible in the background and along the sides of the road.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing clear and blue.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a black car directly in front of the camera and several other cars on the left side of the road.
- truck: A white truck is visible in the distance, driving on the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
